catalog_info.title: Decision Making and the Psychology of Possibility
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: The Psychology Department requires undergraduates to complete Science of Living Systems 20 (or equivalent) and at least one foundational course from PSY 14, PSY 15, PSY 18, or Science of Living Systems 15 before enrolling in this course.
catalog_info.description: Topics in decision making such as rationality, risk-taking, helplessness, and health are examined through the lens of mindfulness theory. Special emphasis given to the psychology of possibility in applied settings.
